title: Tyke
author: Tyke
content: Bitcoin 2008/09 - 2024 History Book progress:https://twitter.com/CryptoBooksAlt/status/1636061010929786885Totally determined to write a spectacular #Bitcoin 2008-2024 history book!Still seeking sponsors (who wants their name/logo represented?)Nearly completed chapter 2010 titled 'Mt Gox, Pizza Day & First BTC Mining Pool'Please contact if you want your name in the book!$BTC

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: Quote from: Tyke on March 16, 2023, 11:25:58 PMStill seeking sponsors (who wants their name/logo represented?)Nearly completed chapter 2010 titled 'Mt Gox, Pizza Day & First BTC Mining Pool'Please contact if you want your name in the book!Some candidates as sponsor for your book.Betnomi a sponsor in 2022 Bitcointalk Community awards. They did sponsored it in previous years too.Sportsbet and Bestchange which are sponsors for 2021 Bitcointalk Community AwardsI believe they don't have financial issue to sponsor you and your book but you must prove quality of your books with them.
